title: Gallery : Action from Colney ahead of Chelsea trip
body_text:
Our men's first-team squad were put through their paces in our final training session ahead of the weekend's game against Chelsea, and you can see the best photos in our gallery.
We head to west London looking to win four successive games at Stamford Bridge, as well as maintain our unbeaten start to the season and even potentially move to the top of the table during the weekend.
With all that at stake, you can see the focus of Mikel Arteta's squad in the images below, which were shot on Friday afternoon by our club photographer Stuart MacFarlane.
